recipe.title: Apple Frangipane Tart
recipe.description: The sweet frangipane filling with almonds is a lovely addition and really brings these little tarts to a whole new flavor level.

ingredients.item-name: Extra melted butter and sugar for sprinkling

directions.step: Preheat the oven to 200 degrees C.
Place the pastry on a lined oven tray to thaw.
Cut each sheet into 4 squares and prick all over with a fork to stop it from puffing up too much.
For frangipane filling, cream the sugar and butter togethe until light. Add the egg and mix to combine. Finally, add the almond meal, plain flour, and vanilla extract and mix to combine.
Spread the frangipane mixture evenly on the puff pastry squares leaving 1 cm of edge all the way around.
Arrange the apple slices in a petal pattern.
Brush the tarts with melted butter and sprinkle the top with the extra sugar.
Bake for about 20 to 25 minutes until the pastry is puffed and golden around the edges.
directions.optional_step: Drizzle with honey after baking and seve with a dollop of whipped cream.
